labels.analysis: The MCP Server specializes in analyzing visual media (images and videos) to extract detailed insights using AI-powered models like Gemini 2.0 Flash. It supports multiple input methods, including URLs, local file paths, and YouTube URLs. The server's primary value is in high-precision image and video recognition, making it suitable for applications that require visual content understanding.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality of image and video analysis clearly falls under AI/ML Tools, as it leverages advanced AI models to process visual media. The ability to handle diverse input sources (local files, URLs, YouTube) aligns with API Integration capabilities. The custom label "Media Analysis" further specifies the server's domain within AI/ML tools.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Image Analysis Server
server_info_crawled.author: @Rentapad/image-mcp-server-gemini
server_info_crawled.overview: Analyze images and videos by providing URLs or local file paths. Gain insights and detailed descriptions of image content using advanced AI models. Enhance your applications with high-precision image recognition and video analysis capabilities.

tools.name: analyze_image
tools.description: Deploy Server Image Analysis Server @Rentapad/image-mcp-server-gemini Try in Playground analyze_image

tools.name: analyze_image_from_path
tools.description: Loads one or more images from local file paths and analyzes their contents using Flash 2.0. Can analyze relationships between multiple images. Provide valid paths for the server environment.

tools.name: analyze_video
tools.description: Downloads videos from URLs, analyzes content using Gemini 2.0 Flash. Best for small videos (<20MB). Can analyze multiple videos together.

tools.name: analyze_video_from_path
tools.description: Loads videos from local paths, analyzes content using Gemini 2.0 Flash. Best for small videos (<20MB). Can analyze multiple videos together.

tools.name: analyze_youtube_video
tools.description: Analyzes a video directly from a YouTube URL using Gemini 2.0 Flash.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@Rentapad/image-mcp-server-gemini/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: geminiApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Your Google Gemini API key required for image analysis.
